sqlMap.sql:
SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.REQ_ID ,A.PROCESS_ID ,A.FLOW_ID , B.FLOW_NM , A.WORK_ID ,A.WORK_STATUS_CD ,A.WORK_ADM_CONTENT ,A.WORK_CONTENT , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#,'REQ00010',A.WORK_STATUS_CD,'1') AS WORK_STATUS_NM , A.WORK_CHARGER_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.WORK_CHARGER_ID,'1') AS WORK_CHARGER_NM , NVL2(A.WORK_ADM_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.WORK_ADM_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') WORK_ADM_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.WORK_ADM_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.WORK_ADM_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') WORK_ADM_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.WORK_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.WORK_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') WORK_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.WORK_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.WORK_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') WORK_ED_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID,'1') AS REG_USR_NM , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.MODIFY_USR_ID,'1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM REQ4400 A, PRJ1101 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID(+) AND A.FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID(+)
AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND A.WORK_CHARGER_ID = #workChargerId#
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC ) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND A.WORK_CHARGER_ID = #workChargerId#
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC ) T1
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.WORK_ID = #workId# ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
AND A.WORK_CHARGER_ID = #usrId# ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_WORK_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_WORK_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'WOK' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_WORK_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(WORK_ID) AS NEW_WORK_ID FROM REQ4400 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.WORK_ID LIKE 'WOK' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO REQ4400 ( PRJ_ID, REQ_ID, PROCESS_ID ,FLOW_ID, WORK_ID, WORK_STATUS_CD ,WORK_ADM_CONTENT, WORK_CHARGER_ID, WORK_ADM_ST_DTM, WORK_ADM_ED_DTM ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, #processId# ,#flowId#, #newWorkId#, #workStatusCd# ,#workAdmContent#, #workChargerId# ,TO_DATE(REPLACE(#workAdmStDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') ,TO_DATE(REPLACE(#workAdmEdDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE REQ4400 A SET
WORK_ADM_CONTENT = #workAdmContent# , WORK_CHARGER_ID = #workChargerId# , WORK_ADM_ST_DTM = TO_DATE(REPLACE(#workAdmStDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') , WORK_ADM_ED_DTM = TO_DATE(REPLACE(#workAdmEdDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD')
WORK_CONTENT = #workContent# , WORK_ST_DTM = TO_DATE(REPLACE(#workStDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') , WORK_ED_DTM = TO_DATE(REPLACE(#workEdDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') , WORK_STATUS_CD = #workStatusCd#
, MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.WORK_ID = #workId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REQ4400 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.WORK_ID = #workId#
